title: Building fairer AI Systems with Fairlearn | AI Show
description:
There are many ways that an AI system can behave unfairly. In this AI show, you will learn about Fairlearn, a community-driven open source machine learning fairness toolkit that empowers developers of artificial intelligence systems to assess their systems' fairness and mitigate any observed fairness issues.  Fairlearn focuses on negative impacts for groups of people, such as those defined in terms of race, gender, age, or disability status.

[02:59] What causes unfairness in AI systems?
